headline.main: MONTGOMERY PRAISES AMERICANS' SUPPORT; British Commander in Sicily Confers With General Patton

lead_paragraph: WITH THE SEVENTH ARMY IN SICILY, July 28 (Delayed) -- Highest praise for the American soldier came today from one who ought to know, Gen. Sir. Bernard L. Montgomery, who arrived this morning for a conference with Gen. George S. Patton.
abstract: Gen Sir B L Montgomery conf with Lt Gen Patton; lauds US troops and air support; repts Gers fight hard
snippet: WITH THE SEVENTH ARMY IN SICILY, July 28 (Delayed) -- Highest praise for the American soldier came today from one who ought to know, Gen. Sir. Bernard L. Montgomery, who arrived this morning for a conference with Gen. George S. Patton....

byline.original: By Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
